title: Microsoft Certified Azure Fundamentals
description: Demonstrated foundational knowledge of cloud concepts and Microsoft Azure, including its architectural components, services (compute, networking, storage), and security, governance, and administration features. Prepared to pursue deeper technical specializations within the Azure platform.

title: Scrum FOundation Professional Certificate
description: Scrum Foundation Professional Certification holders have developed entry-level skills in Scrum that endorse their fundamental knowledge in this framework. They have demonstrated an understanding of the empirical Scrum pillars of transparency, inspection, and adaptation. Their primary focus is on the work of Sprint to make the best possible progress toward these goals.

title: Scrum Master Professional Certificate - SMPC
description: Scrum Master Professional Certificate holders have an understanding of Scrum theory, practices, and rules, both within the Scrum Team and the organization with the ability to apply them to all industries. They will be able to demonstrate their knowledge and compression of Agile mindset and values, continuous improvement, team leadership, performance, and coaching the team members in self-management and cross-functionality.
